messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who founded Arkham House Publishing?
Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What star is the planet circling around?
unspecified
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the Arab poet in 'The Nameless City'?
Abdul Alhazred
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the name of HPL's boyhood persona?
Abdul Alhazred
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was the story 'The Hound' mentioned?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is Abdul Alhazred?
An Arab poet mentioned in an earlier story, ‗The Nameless City’ (1921).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Lovecraft's cause of death?
Bright’s disease and virulent cancer.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How old was Lovecraft when he died?
46 years old.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How long was Lovecraft's marriage?
A brief, two-year marriage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What event led to Lovecraft's return to Providence?
A brief, two-year marriage that proved disastrous.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When did Lovecraft die?
in March of 1937
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did Lovecraft's father die?
in the same institution where his mother had died
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the outcome of Lovecraft's brief marriage?
divorce was never made final
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where did Lovecraft travel to in his later years?
Maine, Philadelphia, Quebec, St. Augustine, Charlotte, New Orleans, Salem, and Nantucket
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did Lovecraft travel during his trips?
by bus, sleeping in YMCAs
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where did Lovecraft travel by bus?
He traveled by bus to places such as Maine, Philadelphia, and Quebec.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Lovecraft's preferred method of sleeping during his travels?
He slept in YMCAs.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What food items did Lovecraft typically eat during his travels?
He ate crackers, cheese, and canned beans.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What health issues was Lovecraft prone to?
He was predisposed to hypochondria and had a premature pose of old age.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was one of Lovecraft's dislikes?
He was allergic to cold and repulsed by seafood.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who contributed the most to the Lovecraft Mythos in the 1940s and '50s?
August Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who added a few stories to the Lovecraft Mythos in the 1940s and '50s?
Robert Bloch and James Wade
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How did many respond to Lovecraft's philosophies?
They achieved fame far greater than their mentor ever enjoyed during his lifetime.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What mediums allow people to discover Lovecraft today?
His stories, through films, games, comics, or trading cards.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who initially expanded the Mythos quietly in the 1940s and ‘50s?
The 1940s and ‘50s saw a quiet expansion of the Mythos.
